title: My ULTIMATE GUIDE to Keyword Ads on Amazon KDP
description:
This video includes EVERYTHING you need to know about Keyword Ads for selling books on Amazon KDP. I'll go through common questions, including what are keyword ads? How do keyword ads work? What should you bid? How do you find keywords? Which match type should I use? How do I see if they're working? How to make my ads more profitable? And many more...

I'll also do a complete walkthrough on how to set up Amazon Ads, with tips and tricks that I've learned along the way. This video can help you to create better ads and sell more books on Amazon KDP.

Find out more about Amazon Ads here: https://advertising.amazon.com/solutions/products/
sponsored-products?
